nodes.text: Doctor Aphra 4 is the fourth issue of the canon comic book series Star Wars: Doctor Aphra. It was written by Alyssa Wong, illustrated by Marika Cresta, and published by Marvel Comics on September 30, 2020. It features the story "Fortune and Fate Part 4: The Deal," in which Chelli Aphra and company make their escape from Vaale, and Just Lucky strikes a deal with Ronen Tagge.

RING OF FIRE! Trapped and betrayed, DOCTOR APHRA fights to escape the cursed city of VAALE before madness overcomes her! Meanwhile, RONEN TAGGE's sinister plan for the RINGS OF VAALE approaches fruition. Will Aphra be able to thwart him in time?
Doctor Aphra 4 was originally solicited for June 10, 2020.
